info.title: Azure Cloud HSM Resource Provider
info.description: The Azure management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Azure Cloud HSM RP.

tags: Cloud HSM Cluster - Create or Update
put.description: Create or Update a Cloud HSM Cluster in the specified subscription.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Parameters to create Cloud HSM Cluster

200.description: Created or Update Cloud HSM Cluster

201.description: Created or Update Cloud HSM Cluster

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Update a Cloud HSM Cluster in the specified subscription.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Parameters to create Cloud HSM Cluster

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

Location.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the specified Cloud HSM Cluster

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified Cloud HSM Cluster

Location.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

tags: Cloud HSM Cluster - Get by Resource Group
get.description: The List operation gets information about the Cloud HSM Clusters associated with the subscription and within the specified resource group.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: The page-continuation token to use with a paged version of this API

200.description: Get information about all Cloud HSM Clusters in the specified resource group.

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

tags: Cloud HSM Cluster - Get by Subscription
get.description: The List operation gets information about the Cloud HSM Clusters associated with the subscription.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: The page-continuation token to use with a paged version of this API

200.description: Get information about all Cloud HSM Clusters in the specified subscription.

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

tags: Cloud HSM Cluster Private Link - Get
get.description: Gets the private link resources supported for the Cloud Hsm Cluster.

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

tags: Cloud HSM Cluster Private Endpoint - Create
put.description: Creates or updates the private endpoint connection for the Cloud Hsm Cluster.

200.description: OK -- Create or Update the private endpoint connection properties successfully.

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

tags: Cloud HSM Cluster Private Endpoint - Delete
delete.description: Deletes the private endpoint connection for the Cloud Hsm Cluster.

202.description: The private endpoint connection is being deleted.

Location.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

204.description: The private endpoint connection does not exist.

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

tags: Cloud HSM Cluster Private Endpoint - Get
get.description: Gets the private endpoint connection for the Cloud Hsm Cluster.

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

tags: Cloud HSM Cluster Private Endpoint Connections - Get
get.description: The List operation gets information about the private endpoint connections associated with the Cloud HSM Cluster

200.description: List of all CloudHsmCluster private endpoint connections associated with the Cloud HSM Cluster.

default.description: The error response describing why the operation failed.

state.description: The Cloud HSM State. Values are: Deploying, ConfiguringSlb, Starting, Starting, Failed, Failed, Deleting, DeletingSlbEntry, InitialProvisioning, Updating

properties.description: Properties of the Cloud HSM Cluster

autoGeneratedDomainNameLabelScope.description: The Cloud HSM Cluster's auto-generated Domain Name Label Scope

hsms.description: An array of Cloud HSM Cluster's HSMs

privateEndpointConnections.description: List of private endpoint connection resources

publicNetworkAccess.description: The Cloud HSM Cluster public network access

CloudHsmClusterProperties.description: Properties of a Cloud HSM Cluster.

additionalProperties.description: The Cloud HSM Cluster's tag's additional properties

CloudHsmClusterPatchParameters.description: Patchable properties of the Cloud HSM Cluster

family.description: Sku family of the Cloud HSM Cluster

name.description: Sku name of the Cloud HSM Cluster

value.description: The list of Cloud HSM Clusters.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of Cloud HSM Clusters.

etag.description: Modified whenever there is a change in the state of private endpoint connection.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the private endpoint connection resource.

groupIds.description: The group ids for the private endpoint resource.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: Properties of the private endpoint connection.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of private endpoint connections.

PrivateEndpointConnectionListResult.description: List of private endpoint connections associated with the specified resource.

backupId.description: An autogenerated unique string ID for labeling the backup. It contains both a UUID and a date timestamp.

azureStorageBlobContainerUri.description: The Azure blob storage container Uri which contains the backup

token.description: The SAS token pointing to an Azure blob storage container. This property is reserved for Azure Backup Service.

properties.description: Properties of the Cloud HSM Cluster

BackupResultProperties.description: Properties of the Cloud HSM Cluster

azureStorageBlobContainerUri.description: The Azure blob storage container Uri which contains the backup

statusDetails.description: The status details of backup/restore operation

error.description: Error encountered, if any, during the backup/restore operation.

startTime.description: The start time of the backup/restore operation in UTC

endTime.description: The end time of the backup/restore operation in UTC

BackupRestoreBaseResultProperties.description: Backup and Restore operation common properties

cloudHsmClusterName.name: cloudHsmClusterName
cloudHsmClusterName.description: The name of the Cloud HSM Cluster within the specified resource group. Cloud HSM Cluster names must be between 3 and 23 characters in length.

peConnectionName.description: Name of the private endpoint connection associated with the Cloud HSM Cluster.
peConnectionName.name: peConnectionName

backupRestoreJobId.name: jobId
backupRestoreJobId.description: The id returned as part of the backup request
